title: Chaplin
writer: David Robinson, Charles Chaplin, Diana Hawkins
actors: Robert Downey Jr., Geraldine Chaplin, Paul Rhys
plot: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.
country: United Kingdom, France, Italy, Japan, United States
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 3 wins & 20 nominations total
